name.description: A human friendly name for this counterparty

routing_details.description: If your counterparty has two different routing numbers (e.g. separate wire/ACH routing instructions), multiplerouting_detailscan be specified with differentpayment_typevalues if not it contains only number and number type

plaid_processor_token.description: If you've enabled the Modern Treasury + Plaid integration in your Plaid account, you can pass the processor token in this field.

party_address.description: If you are trying to wire money to a counterparty, you'll need an address, which you can include with their account information.

email.description: An optional email to assign to the counterparty.

metadata.description: Metadata to be added to the counterparty. Must be a JSON object

ledger_type.description: Metadata to be added to the counterparty. Must be a JSON object

returnable_id.description: The ID of the object being returned

returnable_type.description: The ID of the object being returned.

code.description: For ACH returns, this is the required ACH return code. Refer to the guide on originating ACH returns for a full list of acceptable codes.

reason.description: For ACH returns, this is the required ACH return code. Refer to the guide on originating ACH returns for a full list of acceptable codes

additional_information.description: If provided, this string will populate the addenda information field of the ACH addenda record. Only the first 44 characters of this string will be used. Any additional characters will be truncated.

Authorization.description: Access token obtained from Okta Authentication,must be provided along with each API request

400.description: No Access Token is provided

401.description:
Bad or expired token. To fix, re-authenticate
the user.

403.description: Bad OAuth request (Incorrect Scope).

Un-Authorized.error: The required scopes are not authorized
